summary.para: Queries the specified global property of the COM runtime.

param.name: dwProperty
param.para: The global property of the COM runtime. For a list of properties that can be set with this method, see .

param.name: pdwValue
param.para: The value of the property.Important For the COMGLB_APPID property, this parameter receives a pointer to the AppID GUID.

returns.para: The return value is S_OK if the property is queried successfully.

summary.para: Sets the specified global property of the COM runtime.

param.name: dwProperty
param.para: The global property of the COM runtime. For a list of properties that can be set with this method, see .

param.name: dwValue
param.para: The value of the property.Important For the COMGLB_APPID property, this parameter must specify a pointer to the APPID GUID.

returns.para: The return value is S_OK if the property was set successfully.
